forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 23C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 71F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early with thunderstorms developing late. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 21C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 70F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 67F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.
